41#include <sys/cdefs.h>
42#if 0
43#if defined(LIBC_SCCS) && !defined(lint)
44static char sccsid[] = "@(#)regfree.c 8.2 (Berkeley) 3/16/94";
45#endif /* LIBC_SCCS and not lint */

48#endif
49
50#include <sys/types.h>
51#include <stdio.h>
52#include <stdlib.h>
53#include <regex.h>
54
55#include "utils.h"
56#include "regex2.h"
57
58/*
59 - regfree - free everything
60 = extern void regfree(regex_t *);
61 */
62void
63regfree(regex_t *preg)
64{
65 struct re_guts *g;
66
67 if (preg->re_magic != MAGIC1) /* oops */
68 return; /* nice to complain, but hard */
69
70 g = preg->re_g;
71 if (g == NULL || g->magic != MAGIC2) /* oops again */
72 return;
73 preg->re_magic = 0; /* mark it invalid */
74 g->magic = 0; /* mark it invalid */
75
76 if (g->strip != NULL)
77 free((char *)g->strip);
78 if (g->stripdata != NULL)
79 free((char *)g->stripdata);
80 if (g->sets != NULL)
81 free((char *)g->sets);
82 if (g->setbits != NULL)
83 free((char *)g->setbits);
84 if (g->must != NULL)
85 free(g->must);
86 free((char *)g);
87}
